views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11

ByeLens is a simple tweak giving you the possibility to hide the magnifying glass, (the little searching lens at the left below near the dots), just with one tap :)

ByeLens is my second tweak (after the release of ByeBadges) that i have compiled again just on my iPhone 6, so i really hope you are going to appreciate it :)

Thanks everyone of you who have tested also ByeLens and who once more have helped me to figure out some stuff!

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek for asking whatever you wanted and mostly for giving me some appreciated suggestions, thanks!

Configure options from settings!

Enjoy!

Version 1.0.4 - Tested and Working Fine also on iOS 11 (Download Enabled). Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to completely Hide/Remove the Dock from your Device (incorporation of ShyDock on my Personal Repository).
Version 0.0.1-24
- Added the option to make Square the Dots.


Version 0.0.1-22
- Added the option to make Clear the Background of the Dock (incorporation of NoDockGround on my Personal Repository).
- iOS 10 fully working.
- Changes and Improvements in Settings.
Version 0.0.1-20
- Completely redesigned and redefined the Settings Panel of the Tweak.
- Optimized the Code and the Preferences.
Version 0.0.1-18
- Revised the Preferences Panel.
- Added the option to hide Lens and Dots.
- Added Extras Section to the Preferences Panel.
- Added the option to make black Lens.
